text: With Every Heartbeat (alternate title: Kiss Me) is an erotic Swedish romance movie. It is about an up-and-coming architect who wants to marry her business partner, but later discovers she is really a lesbian. The movie was released in July 2011. ==References== Category:2011 romance movies Category:2011 LGBT movies Category:2010s erotic movies Category:Swedish-language movies Category:Swedish LGBT movies Category:Swedish romance movies
title: With Every Heartbeat
